title: Memory 1

pages.description:
Cold and hungry, you think back to comfortable times, with the grandkids. They used to call you Papa...

"Papa"... It rings a bell... Something about a certain procedure....

After a while, you remember, "Papa" is part of a passcode.

But passcode for what?

journal_entry: Remembered one of the passcodes, Papa, from good ol' times.
